resources.string: Restore from backup file + recovery phrase
A fresh Bitcoin wallet with a new BIP-39 recovery phrase will be generated from scratch. Once created, please note a recovery phrase down and secure it in a safe place!
Provide a file containing Lightning backup, then provide a recovery phrase to fully restore Bitcoin wallet along with Lightning channels. Turn other copies of your wallet off before proceeding.

Provide a 12-word BIP-39 phrase to restore Bitcoin wallet and hosted channels only. If you had any Lightning channels on a previous device, their balances will be refunded on connecting to remote nodes you had them with.
No authentication support on this phone
Authentication support is blocked at the moment, try again later
Register at least one authentication method in system settings
Orbot is not installed so Tor network can not be used right now. Further wallet progress has been halted because your settings require Tor protection.
It is unclear whether Orbot can provide Tor services right now. Further wallet progress has been halted because your settings require Tor protection.
Orbot has disconnected, halting an app
Suggest us what went wrong and we\'ll work on it!
How was your experience with us?
